instruction: Research a famous author and summarize their accomplishments.
output: J.K. Rowling is a British author and screenwriter best known for creating the immensely popular Harry Potter book and film series. Rowling first began working on Harry Potter in 1990, while she was on a train journey from Manchester to London. She spent several years refining the plot and characters before publishing the novel in 1997. Soon after, the novel gained worldwide popularity and spawned a series of seven best-selling books and multiple blockbuster films. Rowling is also the founder and President of Lumos, a nonprofit that works to improve the lives of disadvantaged children around the world.
